snippet.title: X (エックス Ekkusu) - Mission 1 gameplay
snippet.description:
Due to YouTube lacking some good gameplay videos of the Game Boy title, X (エックス Ekkusu), I've decided to upload some myself along with a video showing how to find Kazumi Totaka's Song in the game.  I also uploaded the original version of the first Tunnel Scene music, which was arranged by Yusuke Takahama for Super Smash Bros. Brawl.  After it was revealed, several people outside of Japan started wondering about X, which they still do today.

The English Wikipedia article about this Game Boy title has some information for you to learn more about it; however, it doesn't have enough citations in it, making it less reliable.

This is Mission 1.  The game begins with the VIXIV passing through a warp tunnel to arrive in Tetamus 2, which plays the same exact song arranged for Super Smash Bros. Brawl. The object is to recover the Power Crystal stolen by the alien army, and deliver it to the Nuclear Silo within 60 minutes. Radar bases will display the location of the Power Crystal or Nuclear Silo, and the finder will point towards these as well.
